card.name: Scavenged Rampager
card.text: Trample Scavenged Rampager gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

card.name: Scrapyard Salvager
card.text: 2R, Sacrifice an artifact: Create two 1/1 colorless Mech artifact creature tokens.

card.name: Slagthrower
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, scry 1 and Slagthrower deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Slipstream Hunter
card.text: Whenever Slipstream Hunter attacks, scry 2. Teleport 1R (You may cast this card for its teleport cost while you’re looking at it in your library or revealing it from your library.)

card.name: Supply Runner
card.text: Whenever Supply Runner attacks, scry 1.

card.name: Take Hostage
card.text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Throw to the Wind
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Throw to the Wind, discard a card. Draw two cards. Teleport 1R (You may cast this card for its teleport cost while you’re looking at it in your library or revealing it from your library.)

card.name: Vulcan Devastators
card.text: Sacrifice an artifact: Vulcan Devastators gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Walking Furnace
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice Walking Furnace or another artifact, you may pay 2. When you do, scry 2 and Walking Furnace deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Wanted Speedster
card.text: Whenever Wanted Speedster attacks, gain control of target creature defending player controls until end of turn. Tap that creature. It is now attacking the defending player.

card.name: Wild Game Huntmaster
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell, Wild Game Huntmaster deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Wormcaller’s Assurance
card.text: If a source you control would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. Teleport 0 (You may cast this card for its teleport cost while you’re looking at it in your library or revealing it from your library.)

card.name: Wrap in Flames
card.text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can’t block this turn.

card.name: Al Maham Pathfinder
card.text: When Al Maham Pathfinder enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech artifact creature token. Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Al Maham Traders
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Angling Constrictor
card.text: Whenever Angling Constrictor or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it entered from your library or was cast from your library, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature that entered the battlefield and a +1/+1 counter on Angling Constrictor. Reconstitute

card.text: Whenever Basirah Composite attacks, create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion creature tokens. They have “Sacrifice this creature: Add C.”

card.name: Bioarchitect
card.text: T: The next activated ability you activate this turn costs up to T less to activate.

card.name: Biocourier
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Biocourier.

card.name: Brood Ambush
card.text: Create two 1/1 green Xeno Scion creature tokens. They have “Sacrifice this creature: Add C.” Each creature you control that’s a Mutant or a Xeno gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Deep into the Subconscious
card.text: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Deep Jungle Hunter
card.text: Flash As Deep Jungle Hunter enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of other creatures. Deep Jungle Hunter enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Ecosystem Collapse
card.text: Choose one or more — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Destroy target land. • Destroy target planeswalker.

card.name: Escaped Test Subject

card.name: Experimental Mutagenics
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. 4G: Return Experimental Mutagenics from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Frontier Anatomist
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Genome Toggle
card.text: Sacrifice any number of creatures. Create a 6/6 green Mutant creature token for each two creatures sacrificed this way.

card.name: Gestation Cycle
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Mutant, Xeno, or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +6/+6 and has reach.

card.text: When Hunted Coadjulate enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Mech artifact creature token. If a creature died this turn, create two of those tokens instead.

card.name: Kushak Subject Prime

Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Screeching Terror
card.text: When Screeching Terror enters the battlefield, creatures with power 2 or less can’t block this turn. Screeching Terror can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

card.name: Sewer Ambush
card.text: You may cast Sewer Ambush as though it had flash if you pay 2 more to cast it. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Sewer Monster
card.text: While casting Sewer Monster, each creature you sacrifice after you’re done activating mana abilities reduces its cost by 2. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.text: Trample 1, Tap an untapped creature you control: Supply Scavengers gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Suppressor of Worlds

card.name: Surge of Fervor
card.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Terraforming Works
card.text: Creature spells you cast cost WUBRG less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. (For example, if you cast a creature spell with mana cost 2RW, it costs 2 to cast.)

card.name: Ultramagnetic Interference
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Teleport 4G (You may cast this card for its teleport cost while you’re looking at it in your library or revealing it from your library.)

card.text: Infiltrate (Whenever this creature attacks with exactly one other creature, it can’t be blocked this turn.) Whenever Shadowlight Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • That player discards a card. • You draw a card.

card.name: Canyon Skitterer

card.name: The Honored Wormcaller
card.text: Trample, haste Other Nomad creatures you control have trample and haste. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may create Shaitan, a legendary 5/5 red and green Worm creature token with trample and haste.

card.name: Wormcaller’s Command
card.text: Choose up to X — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. • Destroy target artifact. • Target player searches their library for a land card, reveals it, put it into their hand, then shuffles.

card.name: Ingolf, the Catalyst
card.text: When Ingolf, the Catalyst enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 colorless Mech artifact creature token. When Ingolf dies, destroy each creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Ingolf’s Command
card.text: Choose up to X — • Arm target creature you control. • Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. • Destroy target enchantment. • Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Support Misdirector
card.text: When Support Misdirector enters or leaves the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Mech artifact creature tokens.

card.name: Publicity Officer
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one — • You gain 1 life. • Each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Representative Vuissance
card.text: T, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card. Put an authority counter on Representative Vuissance. Then if there are five or more authority counters on Vuissance, you win the game. Whenever a creature dies, if it wasn’t sacrificed, remove an authority counter from Vuissance.

card.name: Vuissance’s Command
card.text: Choose up to X — • Target player discards a card. • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target player gains 4 life.

card.name: Matter Redistributor
card.text: T, Sacrifice another artifact: Put 1 or X charge counters on Matter Redistributor, where X is the sacrificed artifact’s mana value. T, Remove X charge counters from Matter Redistributor: Look at the top twice X cards of your library and put an artifact card with mana value twice X or less from among them onto the battlefield.
